title: snowflake.core.external_volume.StorageLocationAzure | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: A model object representing the StorageLocationAzure resource.
Constructs an object of type StorageLocationAzure with the provided properties.
azure_tenant_id (str) – Specifies the ID for your Office 365 tenant that the allowed and blocked storage accounts belong to.
storage_base_url (str) – Specifies the base URL for your cloud storage location.
